modShortDescription: This 7 Days to Die mod adds a Stove Upgrade Kit you craft. Using a hammer or nailgun upgrade the open non lootable stoves in the 7DTD world to a working one.
modDescription:
Always wish you could cook on a real stove and not a campfire? This 7 Days to Die mod adds a Stove Upgrade Kit you craft. Using a hammer or nailgun upgrade the open non lootable stoves in the 7DTD world to a working one to use as a campfire.

**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/A19ModletsJax/tree/a19b168/JaxTeller718_WorkingStoves)** for A19  
**[Download](https://yehonal.github.io/DownGit/#/home?url=https://github.com/JaxTeller718/JaxTeller718_Modlets_Stable/tree/master/JaxTeller718_WorkingStoves)** for A18

If you appreciate JaxTeller718â€™s work here feel free to use this [donate link](https://www.paypal.me/FrankCirabisiJr) to show support.

The forum topic of the mod is [here](https://community.7daystodie.com/topic/19674-jaxteller718-a19-modlet-collection/).
